amendment.description: Amendment increases the grant sizes for "initial grants" and "growth funding grants" for each veterans business center by $50,000 per year per center to $200,000 and $150,000 respectively. In addition, the amendment increases the authorized appropriations to carry out this subsection by $2,000,000 each per year to $12,000,000 in fiscal year 2010 and $14,000,000 in fiscal year 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-121 to increase the grant sizes for `initial grants' and `growth funding grants' for each veterans business center by $50,000 per year per center to $200,000 and $150,000 respectively. In addition, the amendment would increase the authorized appropriations to carry out this subsection by $2,000,000 each per year to $12,000,000 in fiscal year 2010 and $14,000,000 in fiscal year 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Murphy (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
